text: Ludwig van Beethoven's Piano Sonata No. 2 in A major, Op. 2, No. 2, was written in 1795 for Joseph Haydn. It was made public with his first and third sonatas in 1796. Tovey, Beethoven, Encyclop√¶dia Britannica Eleventh Edition The sonata is around 22 minutes long. ==Movements== The sonata has four movements: == References == Category:Compositions in A major Piano Sonata 002
title: Piano Sonata No. 2 (Beethoven)
